arts.ttl: Aston Villa eyeing up double deal with Real Betis, one player also wanted by Tottenham
arts.sum: Aston Villa have looked to the La Liga market with regularity since the arrival of Unai Emery, and they could do so again as they consider the possible signings of Real Betis defender Diego Llorente and midfielder Johnny Cardoso. arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: It's another weekend of top-class action across Europe before the final international break of the year and Jamie Griffith has looked through the major leagues to form a five-team acca.
Tom Hill has score predictions for all nine matches taking place in the Spanish LaLiga this weekend.
